text: قَالَ فَإِنَّا قَدْ فَتَنَّا قَوْمَكَ مِنۢ بَعْدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ ٱلسَّامِرِىُّ

translation.en.sahih: [Allah] said, "But indeed, We have tried your people after you [departed], and the Samiri has led them astray."
translation.id.indonesian: Allah berfirman: "Maka sesungguhnya Kami telah menguji kaummu sesudah kamu tinggalkan, dan mereka telah disesatkan oleh Samiri.
